title: Problem with mouse wheel (zooming) in game
body: My mouse is making me problems in game. Since it's really old, it has problem with mouse wheel. What happens in game, is that mouse randomly starts to zoom in, which makes me problems in team fights or etc. Knowing that there isn't any option to disable zoom in game, I tried disabling mouse wheel via regedit, which disabled it on computer, but didn't disable it in game, zooming still works... I've also tried to paste rollersbuttonspeed=0 in input.ini file in LeagueofLegends/config, but it is still working. So, does anybody have an idea how to disable zoom in game ? :)

replies.body: Some bindings are reserved and cannot be adjusted, even if it might be disabled outside of game.  Your best bet may be to swap your mouse to rule out the possibility of your mouse having hardware issues.  It may be time for a new mouse, if that's the case.  Good luck!

Just found a fix for it. 
Go to the PersistedSettings.json
Open it with notepad
Go to where you pasted RollerButtonSpeed=0
Change 0 to 1
Save it
Restart LoL client

Also can you change to title to SOLVED if this works for you? Because I have scavenging the net for a fix and nothing worked until I tried this out.
